snippet.title: Idle Planet Miner - Gameplay Walkthrough Tutorial Part #1 (iOS, Android)
snippet.description:
Idle Planet Miner - Gameplay Walkthrough Tutorial Part #1 (iOS, Android)

✌️Like the video and it'll help our community grow
😎 Hit the subscribe button! https://youtube.com/channel/UC5-lZ_hW0ERv-6szorg7kyA?sub_confirmation=1

👾Socials:

https://twitter.com/strydence
http://instagram.com/strydence

🎮 Twitch Stream:

https://www.twitch.tv/strydence

📲 Game App Description:

Idle Planet Miner

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/idle-planet-miner/id1441880123
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TironiumTech.IdlePlanetMiner&hl=en_US&gl=US

Manage your own space mining empire

Start digging for ore in one of the most addicting incremental idle clicker games! Dig your way through the stars!

IDLE PLANET MINER FEATURES

Idle Clicker Gameplay
● Idle to increase your mining rate!
● Tap to smash asteroids and earn rare ore!
● Mine: Earn coins and hire managers!

Incremental Upgrades
● Create an Empire Across the stars!
● Hire managers to improve your output!
● Evolve your digging strategy! Unlock special projects to improve your output!

Upgrade Your Mining Ship
● Play the Market: respond to supply & demand across the galaxy to maximize profits!
● Research special projects and profit!
● Compete in multiplayer tournaments to determine the best space miner
● Rewards to permanently upgrade your mining ship are everywhere!

Idle Mining
● Earn ore and coins when you're not playing
● Quests- complete quests to earn premium rewards

Idle Planet Miner is the perfect incremental clicker / idle game for fans of endless fun. Idle the day away digging for ore, rare metals, coins, and more!

Idle Planet Miner - Dig your way through the stars!
